channel.title: Afrikaans on Video Translator
channel.description: Recent content in Afrikaans on Video Translator

item.title: We Just Completed CSIRO's Innovate To Grow Program
item.description: Here at VideoTranslator, we have been busy. Busy doing what? Well, between hustling, building our product, setting up processes, and building a business the hard way - we had a really good idea. Why don’t we speak to some people who have done the whole innovation to commercialization thing properly? Ideally, these folks have done it before to, maybe even have a track record in turning innovation into commercial outcomes?

item.title: How To Use AI To Save Lions, In Afrikaans
item.description: As part of our process for testing the platform prior to go live, one of the things we look to do is test a large number of different languages. Part of it is good fun, the other objective is to try to change things around to see if we can break the platform and find bugs. Realistically, this means looking for cool videos, and then trying things out with the videos.
